author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
You've probably heard about the Google antitrust case that's been going on most recently the potential for Google having to sell Chrome but the rust of this case could be so much worse for Google if this passes and might cause some collateral damage to Mozilla and Firefox

title: Google's Antitrust Case Is Much Bigger Than Chrome
